changes.details: Automated pipeline with .state/spec.json as single source of truth. FreeCAD headless script assigns per-body colors and exports multi-color 3MF plus individual STLs.

Interactive spec sheet with Three.js 3D viewer, exploded view with component selector, orbit controls, color palette legend, engineering data cards, hardware BOM, and print settings. Replaces TechDraw renderer.

changes.description: Master spec file as single source of truth
changes.details: Centralized .state/spec.json with color palette (6 Krypton-themed colors), parametric dimensions, component-to-color mappings, hardware BOM, and assembly instructions.
Completed design specifications for 7 desk accessories: Argo Pedestal, Rao's Halo, Sunstone Shards, Phantom Zone Conduit, House Crest, Kandor Station, and Fortress Crown.
Refactored repository with .state/ JSON files, interactive HTML dashboards, structured documentation, and Claude AI navigation guide.
Superseded by Three.js spec viewer. Deleted render_spec_sheet.py, blueprint_template_a3.svg, and generated SVG/DXF outputs.

changes.description: Separated bare shell from integrated shell
changes.details: MainShell.stl is now the bare hollow shell (no mounts fused). MainShell_Integrated.stl remains available as a single-piece alternative with SSD, Ethernet, and Pi5 mounts fused in.
Removed orphaned files: KryptonNAS_SpecSheet.FCStd, stale __pycache__, Post.html draft, empty directories. Cleaned .gitignore.

changes.description: HDMI port cutouts not rendering correctly
changes.details: Dual micro-HDMI cutouts on LeftPanel_ShieldArray have incorrect geometry or positioning. Boolean cut may be malformed.

versions.highlight: Initial release - Complete Krypton NAS enclosure

changes.details: 140x100mm base, 160mm height, 85% taper. Integrated SSD clamp mount (z=3mm), Ethernet cradle (z=35mm), and Pi 5 posts (z=65mm). 24 magnet recesses for removable panels.
Radial diamond pattern with central focal point and 3 expanding rings. 6 embedded magnet slots.
Hex matrix pattern with crystal slot vents at top and diamond accents at bottom. RJ45 passthrough cutout.
Shield tessellation pattern with cutouts for USB-C power, dual micro-HDMI, and Ethernet jack.
Sinusoidal wave with diamond nodes. Cutouts for USB 3.0, Ethernet adapter, and SSD cable exit.
Rails with 4 snap-in retention clips for UGREEN M.2 enclosure (125x41x14mm). Tool-free installation at z=3mm.
U-cradle with retention clips for UGREEN USB-C adapter (62x25x15mm). Positioned at z=35mm.
4 corner posts matching Pi 5 hole pattern (85x56mm) with M2.5 threaded holes. Airflow platform at z=65mm, board surface at z=73mm.
Vertical tapered tower with hex grid vents, removable side panel (friction fit), peaked lid with chimney exhaust, and Krypton-themed glyphs.
Angular wedge design (200x100mm) with front-to-rear slope. Convection-driven cooling with arrow vents indicating airflow direction.
